mapper.select: select * from reply where num=#{num} order by intent asc, depth asc
mapper.insert: insert into reply(cNum,num,nick,content,intent,depth) values(reply_num.nextval,#{num},#{nick},#{content},#{intent}, ( select max(depth) from reply where intent=#{intent} ) +1 )
mapper.update: update reply set content=#{content} where cnum= #{cNum}
